statements: SELECT * FROM Researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, institution, publication_count FROM Researchers WHERE publication_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE institution LIKE 'Uni%';
SELECT researcher_id, name FROM Researchers WHERE research_area = 'Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE publication_count BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE publication_count > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, name, institution FROM Researchers WHERE research_area = 'Machine Learning' ORDER BY publication_count DESC;
SELECT name, publication_count FROM Researchers WHERE publication_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY publication_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE institution LIKE '%University%' ORDER BY publication_count DESC, researcher_id;
SELECT researcher_id, name, publication_count FROM Researchers WHERE publication_count < 50 AND institution = 'Harvard University' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, institution FROM researchers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_sources WHERE data_type='Survey';
SELECT source_name FROM data_sources WHERE researcher_id=2;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE institution LIKE '%University%';
SELECT * FROM researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University XYZ';
SELECT r.name, ds.source_name FROM researchers r JOIN data_sources ds ON r.id = ds.researcher_id WHERE ds.data_type = 'Survey' ORDER BY r.name ASC, ds.source_name DESC;
SELECT r.name, COUNT(ds.source_id) AS num_sources FROM researchers r LEFT JOIN data_sources ds ON r.id = ds.researcher_id GROUP BY r.name HAVING num_sources > 3 ORDER BY num_sources DESC;

SELECT r.name, ds.source_name, ds.data_type FROM researchers r INNER JOIN data_sources ds ON r.id = ds.researcher_id WHERE r.institution LIKE '%College%' AND ds.data_type IN ('Survey', 'Experiment') ORDER BY r.name, ds.data_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT id, name, institution FROM researchers ORDER BY name;
SELECT institution, name FROM researchers WHERE field_of_study = 'Biology';
SELECT * FROM data_sources WHERE data_type = 'Experimental Data';
SELECT source_name, data_source_url FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT name, institution, field_of_study FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT researcher_id, data_source_id, regression_model FROM regression_analysis WHERE researcher_id = 1 AND data_source_id = 3;
SELECT source_name, data_type FROM data_sources WHERE data_type IN ('CSV', 'JSON') ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers r JOIN regression_analysis ra ON r.id = ra.researcher_id JOIN data_sources ds ON ra.data_source_id = ds.id WHERE r.institution = 'College' AND ds.data_type = 'API';

SELECT r.name AS researcher_name, ds.source_name AS data_source_name FROM researchers r, data_sources ds, regression_analysis ra WHERE r.id = ra.researcher_id AND ds.id = ra.data_source_id ORDER BY researcher_name ASC, data_source_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM Researchers;
SELECT data_source_name, data_source_type FROM DataSources;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT research_topic, researcher_name FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM Researchers WHERE research_topic = 'Machine Learning';

SELECT R.researcher_name, D.data_source_name, RD.data_value FROM Researchers R INNER JOIN ResearchData RD ON R.researcher_id = RD.researcher_id INNER JOIN DataSources D ON RD.data_source_id = D.data_source_id WHERE RD.data_value > 100;
SELECT R.researcher_name, RA.analysis_date, RA.analysis_result FROM Researchers R INNER JOIN RegressionAnalysis RA ON R.researcher_id = RA.researcher_id WHERE RA.analysis_result < 0;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AggregatedData WHERE data_value > 1000 ORDER BY data_value ASC;
SELECT r.researcher_name, m.model_name FROM Researchers r JOIN RegressionModels m ON r.researcher_id = m.researcher_id;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id FROM Researchers;
SELECT model_name, model_id FROM RegressionModels WHERE researcher_id = 1 ORDER BY model_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS avg_data_value, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM AggregatedData WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM AggregatedData WHERE source_id = 3 AND data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_id;
SELECT Researchers.researcher_name, RegressionModels.model_name FROM Researchers JOIN RegressionModels ON Researchers.researcher_id = RegressionModels.researcher_id;
